NHAN MINH LAP 
2005 – 2009: Ton Duc Thang 
University. Major in Information 
Technology. 
6/2008 – 9/2008: Nhat Nghe. 
Microsoft 
Certified 
Systems 
Administrator. 
2012: Second degree at University of 
Economics HCMC. Major in Foreign 
Trade. 
EDUCATION 
Senior Database Developer 
V3SI: 10/2018 - now 
Project: ScanIP. 
Role: Database developer, BI developer. 
Tech: Elasticsearch, Kibana, SQL Server, SSIS, Data warehouse, 
Power BI, Python. 
• Using Elasticsearch (ES) to store and process data 
from crawler in JSON format. Scripting in also 
JavaScript and Painless. 
• Using Python to retrieve data from ES to csv files 
• Using SSIS to transform data from csv files to SQL 
server (data warehouse). 
• Using Power BI to create reports. 
CAREER OBJECTIVE 
A huge step from Data Developer-
Database Administrator, I want to 
move on as a Data Scientist in the 
future with my passion in retrieving, 
analyzing, visualization data. 
SKILLS 
Computer 
SQL Server 
ETL-SSIS 
Power BI 
Tableau 
Python 
R 
C#, ASP.NET 
ElasticSearch 
Language 
English 
Other Skills 
Problem Solving 
Analytical skill 
Project  management 
Time  management 
Public  Speaking 
Team up with 
teammate 
Hobbies 
Project: Peakvise, Peakvise Generator. 
Role: Database developer. 
Tech: Elasticsearch, SQL Server, Python, Google translate. 
• Using ES to store, process and search data (keywords, 
synonym of Articles and Master Articles). 
• Using Python to process keywords and synonym in 
order to create a dictionary with product’s attribute in 
attribute type. 
• Maintain, upgrade old structure and tuning slow 
queries. 
Project: Hotel management (POS, PMS, AMS). 
Role: Database developer, BI developer. 
Tech: SQL Server, SSIS, Data warehouse, Power BI. 
• Build data warehouse structure to collect data for BI 
dashboard: 
o PMS: 
o POS: 
• Create BI dashboards by Power BI: 
BOSCH Solution Viet Nam - RBVH: 06/2017 – 10/2018 
Senior software developer 
Project: Human Resources System for Bosch Vietnam. 
Role: DB developer, BI, Supporter. 
Tech: SQL Server. 
• Manage and update the current HRS system of Bosch 
Vietnam (PDM, CMS, TMS, LMS, OT, Card Reader). 
• Implement others new requirement. 
• Mass upload contract tool. 
• Auto send reminder email. 
• Design DB structure and work with customer for new 
concept of working type for employee in HcP – 
Bosch’s manufacturing in Dong Nai. 
• Implement pre payroll function. 
• Take part in DB developer for team: help team to 
understand DB structure, create store procedure, 
function, view... when implement new function. 
• Understand the HR business of Bosch and work with 
customers to support them. 
AsianLiveTech: 07/2015 – 5/2017 
Senior Database Developer 
Project: Web Crawler. 
Role: DB Developer, BA, Tester 
Tech: SQL Server. 
Team with .Net developer to create Web crawler to get data 
from other websites: 
• Design table structure. 
• Write Store Procedure, Function. 
• Upgrade the insert and update speed for large 
amount of data. 
• Turning old query. 
• Take and analyze customer’s requirements. 
• Testing. 
• Maintenance and backup database. 
Project: WhiteEastern: eCommerce website. 
www.whiteeastern.com 
Role: DB Developer, BA 
Tech: MySQL, SQL Server 
• Using SQL Server to create DB table structure. 
• Write Store procedure and Funtion. 
• Migrate data from MySQL to SQL Server. 
Project: MFI – MicroFinance: Loan and repayment of one 
Finance company. 
Role: DB Developer, BA, Tester, Trainer, Implementor. 
Tech: SQL Server. 
• Using SQL Server to create DB table structure. 
• Write Store procedure and function. 
• Migrate data from Customer’s excel files to SQL Server. 
• Onsite training and implementation. 
Project: ERP – System for company 
Role:  DB Developer, BA 
Tech: SQL Server 
• Researching 
department’s 
business 
(CRM, 
HR, 
Distribution, Finance, eCommerce, Logistic). 
• Worked and Finished on User’s Management (User’s 
role, 
sitemap, 
access 
right), 
Project 
& 
Tasks 
management. 
• Currency Management. 
MDB Bank: 03/2014 – 07/2015 
MIS Specialist 
• Working with Oracle and T24 Temenos system: 
Booking transaction to the system, tracking 
• unbalance account, creating trial balance document 
and line balance for all people. Checking all the 
• transaction at the end of month to close the 
accounting period and open the next one. 
• Working with database to export data for Finance & 
Accounting Division. 
• Making report at the end of accounting period every 
month. 
• Supporting all the computer problems in team. 
• Complete the monthly reports for The State Bank Of 
Vietnam. 
• Create new and tuning the old SQL Query scripts. 
EXIMBANK Bank: 10/2011 – 12/2013 
Core banking system developer at Deposit 
Team 
• Working with customer account (open/close/partial 
close, deposit/withdraw...) to get used to, 
• maintain and develop the core system. 
• Participating in creating some new programs of fund 
raising. Working with database system to 
• extract data for business; ensuring queries are running 
in the fastest way. 
• Receiving and handling requirements timely. 
• Supporting other branches in necessary information or 
data to complete their reports; assisting them 
• in handling problems in tasks related to the core.
